subject: Fix OneSignal notification 500 error by using absolute URLs
body:
OneSignal API requires web_url to be absolute (https://...), not relative (/chat/...).
Updated Edge Function to use https://synctone.vercel.app as the base URL.

This resolves the error: "Option Begin your notification web_url with http:// or https://."
title: Fix OneSignal notification 500 error by using absolute URLs
